title: Beyond ‘Pride’: Adding depth to our history of LGSM and LAPC
description: A panel discussion featuring historians, writers, and activists, Colin Clews, Jonathan Blake, and Nicola Field on the real story of Lesbians and Gays Support the Miners. Followed by a screening of ‘All Out! Dancing in Dulais’, a short documentary made by activists after the events of 1984/5
